release.action: Upgraded Solr dependencies to Solr 5. Tested to work with versions from Solr 3.x to 5.x (cloud and standalone).
Fixed issue where mixing additions and deletions in the same committer request generated an exception (github #1).
Added Sonatype repository to pom.xml for snapshot releases.
Updated several maven plugins and added SonarQube maven plugin.
Library updates: Norconex Committer Core 2.0.1, Apache Solr 5.0.0, SLF4j 1.7.12, JUnit 4.12, Apache Commons Codec 1.10.
Now licensed under The Apache License, Version 2.0.
Upgraded to work with Norconex Committer 2.0.0 (won't work with older versions).
Document "id" is now referred as document "reference".
Can now retry on commit failures and specify a delay between retries.
Upgraded to Committer version 1.2.0 and refactored code accordingly. Upgraded Solr dependencies to 4.7.
"batchSize configuration option has been renamed to "queueSize". "solrBatchSize" configuration options has been renamed to "committerBatchSize".
Fixed OutOfMemory issue when using the Solr Committer with multiple threads.
Starting with this release, Norconex Solr Committer is open-source under GPL.
